hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Hey! Wait! Don't go out! It's unsafe!^Wild Pokémon live in tall grass!^You need your own Pokémon for your protection.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Red Potion Bottle# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Lens of Truth#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.
